title: Waiting for Spring in the Park
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Uuu, I thought today would be more like spring, but it’s really cold~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah. It’s warm when there’s no wind.... But I guess it’s a little early to call spring.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey Riko-chan, want to eat a Nikuman?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>There’s a convenience store over there, I’ll go get one! Let’s split it in half~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, then I’ll go buy a warm drink, shall we share that too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Sure, sure! Let’s get them and go to the park~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The park.... Won’t it be cold?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>If we have a Nikuman and a warm drink, it’ll be alright~ Besides, it feels better outside!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, you’re right. Even if it’s cold, we would be warm if we huddle up together, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
